languages.text: {n}Авель застывает. В статическом шуме, доносящемся из его вокс-синтезатора, едва слышно звучат слова:{/n} "Именование не оглавляет текст. Именование — и есть текст".
{n}Abel freezes. From his vox-synth, barely audible through the static, come the words:{/n} "The naming of the names is not an index to the text. The naming of the names is the text."
languages.original_text: {n}Авель застывает. В статическом шуме, доносящемся из его вокс-синтезатора, едва слышно звучат слова:{/n} "Именование не оглавляет текст. Именование — и есть текст".

languages.text: {n}アベルは動きを止めた。彼のヴォクス・シンセから、静電気でほとんど聞き取れないものの、言葉が聞こえてきた。{/n}「名称の命名は文章の索引ではありません。名称の命名が文章だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Abel freezes. From his vox-synth, barely audible through the static, come the words:{/n} "The naming of the names is not an index to the text. The naming of the names is the text."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベルは動きを止めた。彼のヴォクス・シンセから、静電気でほとんど聞き取れないものの、言葉が聞こえてきた。{/n}「名称の命名は文章の索引ではありません。名称の命名が文章だ」
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}亚伯愣在了原地，音阵合成器中传来了几乎听不到的话语。{/n}“姓氏的名称并非文本的索引，姓氏的名称本身就是文本。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abel freezes. From his vox-synth, barely audible through the static, come the words:{/n} "The naming of the names is not an index to the text. The naming of the names is the text."

traits.locale_text: {n}亚伯愣在了原地，音阵合成器中传来了几乎听不到的话语。{/n}“姓氏的名称并非文本的索引，姓氏的名称本身就是文本。”
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel erstarrt. Aus seinem Vox-Synth ertönen durch das Rauschen kaum hörbar die Worte:{/n} "Das Nennen der Namen ist keine Textindexierung. Das Nennen der Namen ist der Text."
languages.original_text: {n}Abel freezes. From his vox-synth, barely audible through the static, come the words:{/n} "The naming of the names is not an index to the text. The naming of the names is the text."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel erstarrt. Aus seinem Vox-Synth ertönen durch das Rauschen kaum hörbar die Worte:{/n} "Das Nennen der Namen ist keine Textindexierung. Das Nennen der Namen ist der Text."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel s'immobilise. De son synthétiseur-vox s'élèvent les mots suivants, à peine audibles à travers les parasites :{/n} « La formulation des noms n'est pas un indice dans le texte, elle est le texte. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abel freezes. From his vox-synth, barely audible through the static, come the words:{/n} "The naming of the names is not an index to the text. The naming of the names is the text."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel s'immobilise. De son synthétiseur-vox s'élèvent les mots suivants, à peine audibles à travers les parasites :{/n} « La formulation des noms n'est pas un indice dans le texte, elle est le texte. »
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel se queda paralizado. Desde su voco sintetizador, casi inaudible por la estática, brotan las siguientes palabras:{/n} «La nomenclatura de los nombres no es un índice del texto. La nomenclatura de los nombres es el texto».
languages.original_text: {n}Abel freezes. From his vox-synth, barely audible through the static, come the words:{/n} "The naming of the names is not an index to the text. The naming of the names is the text."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel se queda paralizado. Desde su vocosintetizador, casi inaudible por la estática, brotan las siguientes palabras:{/n} «La nomenclatura de los nombres no es un índice del texto. La nomenclatura de los nombres es el texto».
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel donakalıyor. Voks sentezleyicisinden, parazitten ötürü güçlükle duyulabilen birtakım kelimeler çıkıyor.{/n} "İsimlerin isimlendirilmesi, metin için bir dizin değildir. İsimlerin isimlendirilmesi, metnin kendisidir."
languages.original_text: {n}Abel freezes. From his vox-synth, barely audible through the static, come the words:{/n} "The naming of the names is not an index to the text. The naming of the names is the text."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel donakalıyor. Voks sentezleyicisinden, parazit sesinden güçlükle duyulabilen bazı kelimeler çıkıyor:{/n} "İsimlerin isimlendirilmesi, metin için bir dizin değildir. İsimlerin isimlendirilmesi, metnin kendisidir."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved
